title: #115 - Hitting A Bullseye With A Hammer - The Shiftlessness of Chris Mason
description:
This week, we are confronted with pint glasses full of crazy, as we delve into a sport that we've never covered before, and a man who is truly what Crime In Sports is all about... Ego, self-destruction & and the complete disregard for others. This guy has it all. Multiple assaults, culminating in a 3 man hammer & bat attack, for the silliest reason imaginable, and that's just part of the fun within!!
Call drinking at the pub "going to work", leave your pregnant wife & be publicly shamed for it, and attack a virtual stranger for his opinion about a friend's dog with Chris "Mace The Ace" Mason!!
Check us out, every Tuesday. We will continue to bring you the biggest idiots in sports history!
